Property.Name: QueryScript
Property.Value: SELECT MAX(pr.Name) AS PriceRangeName, AVG(CAST(pap.Value AS DECIMAL(10, 2))) AS AverageVolume FROM Product pro WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN PriceRange pr WITH (NOLOCK) ON pro.Price > pr.PriceLow AND (pro.Price <= pr.PriceHigh OR pr.PriceHigh IS NULL) INNER JOIN ProductAdditionalProductParameterMapping pap WITH (NOLOCK) ON pap.ProductId = pro.Id INNER JOIN AdditionalProductParameter app WITH (NOLOCK) ON app.Id = pap.AdditionalProductParameterId WHERE app.Code = 'ProductVolume' AND pro.IsActive = 1 GROUP BY pr.Id

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE VIEW [dbo].[AverageProductVolume] AS

Property.Name: CheckExpressionScript
Property.Value: Price > 0

Property.Name: CheckExpressionScript
Property.Value: Quantity > 0

Property.Name: QueryScript
Property.Value: SELECT sto.Id AS StoreId, MAX(sto.Name) AS StoreName, pro.Id AS ProductId, MAX(pro.Name) AS ProductName, DATEPART(YEAR, sal.OperationDate) AS [Year], DATEPART(MONTH, sal.OperationDate) AS [Month], ISNULL(SUM(sd.Quantity), 0) AS TotalQuantity, ISNULL(SUM(sd.Quantity * pro.Price), 0) AS TotalSum FROM Store sto WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN Sale sal WITH (NOLOCK) ON sto.Id = sal.StoreId LEFT JOIN SaleDetail sd WITH (NOLOCK) ON sd.SaleId = sal.Id LEFT JOIN Product pro WITH (NOLOCK) ON pro.Id = sd.ProductId WHERE sal.IsActive = 1 AND sto.IsActive = 1 AND sd.IsActive = 1 AND pro.IsActive = 1 GROUP BY sto.Id, pro.Id, DATEPART(YEAR, sal.OperationDate), DATEPART(MONTH, sal.OperationDate)

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE VIEW [dbo].[SaleTotal] AS
